Typealiases.html#/s:7RxState7Reducera.name: Reducer
Typealiases.html#/s:7RxState7Reducera.abstract: A Reducer mutates an input state into an output state according to an action

Protocols/Action.html#/s:7RxState6Action.name: toAsync()
Protocols/Action.html#/s:7RxState6Action.abstract: Convert the action into an Observable so it is compliant with asynchronous processing

Protocols/Store.html#/s:7RxState5StoreP0.name: StateType
Protocols/Store.html#/s:7RxState5StoreP0.abstract: A store is dedicated to the mutation/observation of this StateType

Protocols/Store.html#/s:7RxState5StorePx.name: init(withReducers:)
Protocols/Store.html#/s:7RxState5StorePx.abstract: Inits the Store with its reducers stack

Protocols/Store.html#/s:7RxState5StoreP8.name: dispatch(action:)
Protocols/Store.html#/s:7RxState5StoreP8.abstract: Dispatch an action through the reducers to mutate the state

Protocols/Store.html.name: Store
Protocols/Store.html.abstract: A Store holds the state, mutate the state through actions / reducers and exposes the state via a Driver

Protocols.html#/s:7RxState0B0P.name: State
Protocols.html#/s:7RxState0B0P.abstract: Conform to the State protocol to be handled by a Store

Protocols/Action.html.name: Action
Protocols/Action.html.abstract: Conform to an Action to mutate the State synchronously or asynchronously

Classes/DefaultStore.html.name: DefaultStore
Classes/DefaultStore.html.abstract: A default store that will handle a specific kind of State

Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
